question: Why Jesus (A.S.) will be arriving for second time and how?
answer:
QUESTION
This question is regarding Jesus (A.S.) arrival for second time in this world.I want to know why he is so to arrive as described in Quran.
ANSWER


Share:
The arrival of Jesus (Eesa - may Everlasting Peace be upon him), is the
decree of Allah. Allah is not to be questioned for whatever He does.

However, upon the appearance of Eesa (may Everlasting Peace be upon him), he
will follow the Shari'ah (rule of Law) as taught by our beloved Prophet,
Muhammad (may Everlasting peace be upon him). He will establish justice and
peace and will also kill the Dajjaal (anti-christ).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
